name: 7th Edition of International Cancer Conference
content: You are cordially invited to the “7th Edition of International Cancer Conference” (ICC-2024) organized by Magnus Group. This prestigious conference will be held from October 17-19, 2024, in the enchanting country of Baltimore, Maryland, USA. Cancer Congress offers a unique hybrid event experience, allowing participants to join either In-person or online. Bringing together professionals, researchers, scientists, industry leaders, and enthusiasts from around the world, Cancer Conferences aims to delve into the theme of “Innovate to Eradicate: Inspiring Progress in the Fight Against Cancer.” This compelling event offers a platform to delve into the latest breakthroughs and revelations in the realm of cancer research and treatment. By participating in the Cancer Congress, you will have the chance to engage in enlightening conversations, gain valuable insights from keynote presentations by renowned experts, and take part in informative sessions and workshops. The Cancer Conference program covers a diverse array of topics, spanning different facets of cancer research and care, including cutting-edge technologies, patient care, treatment advancements, and supportive services. Don't miss out on this extraordinary opportunity to become a part of the Cancer Congress.
